feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • doc: add py sdk docs for when not to run functions in activities by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1336
  • feat(python): More Pythoninc store API by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1330
  • bug(python): Document all Python SDK modules by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1337
  • bug(python): Better error when calling next_event in activity by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1332
  • bug(python): In asyncio exception, value can be a coroutine. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(ENG-2158): add metrics to workflow executor by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1343

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.2...v0.18.3

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add anthropic connection test func by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1341
  • fix(ENG-2161): executor race condition fix by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1344

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.3...v0.18.4

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add k8s connection test function by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1342
  • feat(python): Switch to uv by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1245
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1340
  • feat(store): add by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1338
  • feat(ENG-2165): external dispatching by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.4...v0.19.0

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add AirTable integration by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1328
  • fix(ENV-2170): make uv install correctly in containers by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1348
  • fix: return 429 rate limit on webhook if exhausted by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1349

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.19.0...v0.19.1
